## Load Packages

library(janitor)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggplot2)

library(tidyverse)

## First Listed Genre and Rating

```{r}
ggplot(firstGenres) +
  aes(x = rating, y = Genre1) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "#4682B4") +
  labs(
    x = "Average Rating of Movies",
    y = "Genres",
    title = "First-Listed Genre and Rating"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 20L,
    face = "bold",
    hjust = 0.5),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 15L),
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 15L),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 13L),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 13L)
  )

```
